details.description: Find out how to plan what money's coming in and going out of your business, and how this can help improve your finances - sales forecast, sales revenue, projects sales revenue, profit and loss forecast, cash flow forecast
details.body: Find out how to plan what money’s coming in and going out of your business, and how this can help improve your finances.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
How to write a business plan - what to include, business goals, market research and financial plans, how to write an executive summary
Steps to turn your business idea into a product or service you can sell and that meets your customers' needs
Find out what your business's cash-flow is and how understanding this can help improve your business - current accounts, short term deposits, cash flow
Get advice on how you can avoid cash-flow problems for your business and how to improve your finances - cash flow forecasting, business growth
